title: (x) New Optimus publicity typeface - Aaux {Linus}
content:
Very DINish, the R is very METAish and Q tail is very peculiar… Also the Ç is very anguled (second image)attached. What’s the font? :)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [optimus\_redes.jpg](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=optimus_redes.jpg) | 33.13 KB |
| [optimus\_redes2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=optimus_redes2.jpg) | 13.44 KB |
author: adriano

comments.content:
[Aaux by T26.](http://web.archive.org/web/20050528001118/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/t26/aaux/)  
The bent inner tail on the Q gave it away.
